name: Dictionary App
description: A dictionary app that supports searching, saving and categorizing words. Utilizes Discord OAuth2 to facilitate user accounts.

name: Pixel Canvas
description: Collaborative app where users can create and draw on a canvas. Utilizes Websockets for live pixel updates and chat messages.

name: Shot Clock
description: Billiards shot clock for professional play. Uses websockets to synchronize clock display across all clients.

name: Photo Tagging App
description: A where's Waldo style game with an online leaderboard. Uses Firebase for storage and anonymous account control.

name: Age Calculator
description: App to view someone's exact age in every moment. Uses search parameters to create savable and shareable stats.

name: Flamin Finger
description: Recreation of the 2003 arcade game. Employs a modified randomized DFS algorithm for path generation. Includes online leaderboard.
